about.us: Monky is a secure, reliable and transparent Cardano stake pool located in Germany, run by renewable energy sources. We contribute by providing a crypto academy platform on https://denkweise.blog.
about.server: Our server is running on: </br>  • AMD Ryzen 5 3600 (6 x 3,6 GHZ) </br> • 32GB DDR4 RAM • 500GB SSD • Ubuntu 20.04
